items.sentence: The last time I saw Tom he was still in college.
The last time I saw Tom he was still a teenager.
The last time I saw Tom he was riding a bicycle.
The heat didn't seem to bother Tom in the least.
The cold didn't seem to bother Tom in the least.
Neither Tom nor Mary has won an award this year.
Neither Tom nor Mary has much money in the bank.
Neither Tom nor Mary has made any bad decisions.
Neither Tom nor Mary has had very much to drink.
Neither Tom nor Mary has denied the allegations.
